articles.title: Remembering Maria Pellegrini, the opera diva next door
articles.description: She was famous for her performances in Madame Butterfly. But she was also my lovely neighbour in Wellington Village who died last month.

articles.title: Unemployment rate jumps to 6.8% in December despite job gain
articles.description: OTTAWA — Statistics Canada says a boost in the number of people looking for work in December drove the unemployment rate higher at the end of the year. articles.title: Scientists test a tiny eye implant that could restore sight
articles.description: Scientists at USC are launching a new trial to test a tiny stem cell implant that could restore vision in people with advanced dry macular degeneration. The hair-thin patch replaces damaged retinal cells responsible for sharp, central vision. Earlier studies showed the implant was safe and helped so

articles.title: The 4x rule: Why some people’s DNA is more unstable than others
articles.description: A large genetic study shows that many people carry DNA sequences that slowly expand as they get older. articles.title: One dead, dozens trapped after giant landfill collapses in Philippines
articles.description: Rescuers have pulled 12 injured sanitation workers from debris at the private landfill in Cebu City.
